author: Dick Bradsell
description: In Poland, Bison Grass vodka and apple juice are a classic combo, here also with an additional splash of Polish honey liqueur.Adjust the quantity of apple juice and honey liqueur to suit your palate. We've played around with this recipe a lot over the years (it's one of our favs) and for us, equal parts (preferably with freshly pressed green apple juice) is perfectly balanced.
name: Polish Martini
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
